title: School-Based Design and Maker Education Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Design Knowledge and Domain Expertise (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: Most learners are professionals, with the educational environment emphasizing reflective practice and collaborative learning based on field experience.

learning_goals: Learners can design a language education project proposal by applying a school-based design thinking process.
Learners can develop maker education scenarios by utilizing digital production tools and collaborative teaching techniques.
Learners can evaluate the instructional design process and derive improvement strategies through reflective practice.
Learners can establish a collaborative learning environment through peer assessment and feedback mechanisms.

resources: Digital Fabrication Equipment (3D Printer, Laser Cutter) Tutorial Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
